title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with egg-cheese mixture and pancetta.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice mix for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Fry onions, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
